price: 48. Kaadu Yallah salat abaay kaah rammita keenik iyyeenik, salat kaah maabaanaay, kaah marammitan.
arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱرۡكَعُواْ لَا يَرۡكَعُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā qīla lahumu ir'kaʿū lā yarkaʿūna
